alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 2:47PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Okanogan County through 315 PM PDT... At 247 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of North Omak, or 10 miles northeast of Omak, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Omak, North Omak, Riverside and Synarep. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County
